column5: The course prepares you for senior roles, your aim is to accelerate your progress towards well-paid positions of leadership. On completion of the first term, you can transfer to a range of postgraduate courses, including:    MSc Finance and Management   MA Marketing   MSc Human Resource Management   MSc International Business Management   MSc Tourism and Events   MSc Tourism and Hospitality   LLM Law   LLM Criminal Law and Procedure   LLM International Human Rights   LLM Commercial Law and International Trade    Please click 'apply now' to see which courses are currently open for application.
